content:
Hello, friends.
I'm doing some DS projects in Julia, and as of now, my project is all over the place. I was wondering what are some of the best practices the community has in terms of how to organize the code of a project.
I've used the great DrWatson.jl package before, but the package seems more focused on actual scientific inquiries. I was wondering if there is any similar package, but tailored to DS.
:D
Or perhaps DrWatson.jl is the way to go, and I have to get more used to it.
